captions.text:
Cruise in on a Batman Tumbler that you control
with your cell phone and if you fallout, grab

yourself one of these glow-in-the-dark Nuka
Colas. Because I’m Jake and this is episode
#30 of Game LÜT.

Take a bite out of some Legend of Zelda Gacha
which are chocolate balls that have a Zelda

figurine in the middle. Clean your hands off
with Pokéball soap so you don’t get any

chocolate smeared onto your Dragon Ball Z
kicks. If going super saiyan took it out of

you, recharge with an external battery and
SD card reader that looks like a Famicom controller.

Feeling better? Good, so put down that Game
Boy Mug onto one of these beautiful Skyrim

Guard Shield coasters so you can 3D Print
Mario Kart RC turtle shells…

For this next bit we’re going to need a
lot of light so turn on a Street Fighter Ryu

Figure, awesome Batman Cowl Replica lamp,
and then burn some Video Game Candles that

fill the room with scents of White Mage, Hyrulian
Forest or Quantum Tunnel. Now that we have

enough illumination, turn everything off so
we can see that glow-in-the-dark Minecraft

shirt. Gah, what is that glowing bright aura
coming from? Oh, it’s just a completely

gold plated Xbox One Controller. Always trying
to be the center of attention.

You’re probably hungry so have A Taco…Titan
Tshirt or for something more substantial try

the Fry Scores Video Game Cookbook with recipes
like Skyrim’s Apple Cabbage Stew or Yeto’s

Soup from Twilight Princess and write down
how delicious it was in a Leather Bound Legend

of Zelda Triforce journal but if animal hide
isn’t your thing there’s a Chewbacca Fur

Journal. Rip out a page to write a letter
and seal it with a Dragon Age Grey Warden

ring to create a wax seal. Then brush up on
the latest Oscar Nominated films with these
awesome video game parody posters….

Now grab your Limited Edition Mass Effect
Full Scale Geth Pulse Rifle, get into Samus

Power Armor made entirely out of paper and
start playing Metroid games on a custom NES

arcade. There is even one for the Atari 2600.
For a truly portable console, pocket this

Pi-Tendo - a tiny NES and SNES emulator built
from a raspberry pi.

Then build yourself up with Mega-Man tshirts
from Insert Coin. And keep building by constructing

a Metal Gear Solid Rex while wearing Metal
Gear Solid clothes from Musterbrand.

Now you might want to put on that Thor Dress
and grab your Super Hero chess pieces as you

select your hero with these great prints by
The Beast is Back...

Keep yourself warm this winter with a Portal
Engineer Winter Jacket and a Vsauce beanie
that you can get for 50% using code VSAUCE.

Also, my friends and awesome YouTubers Toy
Pizza created a limited edition Vsauce3 action

figure that you can get from their Kickstarter.
You can even get it with a tiny fedora...all

of my dreams are coming true and, as always,
thanks for watching.
